body: Make me wonder was Tabitha the case of "those" "magic-welder" where they have a book (Mirror, Water surface's reflection...) that can see to present/past/future events so they always be potrayed with it all the time and never be supprise by anything like ever (kept their composures because they have seen it before it happened) or am i looking too much into this and gone pass the true image of her is that shes just your "by the book" stone-cold Den/Kuudere on the outside and only when Dere did they turn 180 only for the Duration of the Dere and a bookworm?
